subject: The Wrong Product
description_text:
I had bought the 7+R shifter and received the 6+R one. I paid the price for
the 7+R and would be willing to send the other one back, but I don't know
how or rather what processes I would need to follow to get that back to you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Robert Sellers,  6+R is better than 7+R, and it is also more expensive. You can try it out first.
